name: Signature Pad
description: Signature Pad is a component for drawing smooth signatures.

properties.name: penColor
properties.label: Pen Color
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine what color should be applied to pen.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the description of the Signature Pad. Value returned by the handler will be used as the description of the Signature Pad.

properties.name: savePNGButtonVisibility
properties.label: Save PNG Button Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the Save PNG button should be visible. If the handler returns 'true' the button will be displayed.

properties.name: saveJPGButtonVisibility
properties.label: Save JPG Button Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the Save JPG button should be visible. If the handler returns 'true' the button will be displayed.

properties.name: saveSVGButtonVisibility
properties.label: Save SVG Button Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the Save SVG button should be visible. If the handler returns 'true' the button will be displayed.

properties.name: saveSignatureButtonVisibility
properties.label: Save Signature Button Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the Save Signature button should be visible. If the handler returns 'true' the button will be displayed.

eventHandlers.name: onClearClick
eventHandlers.label: On Clear Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the Clear button.

eventHandlers.name: onUndoClick
eventHandlers.label: On Undo Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the Undo button.

eventHandlers.name: onChangeColor
eventHandlers.label: On Change Color Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user changes the pen color.

eventHandlers.name: onSaveClick
eventHandlers.label: On Save Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps "Save as PNG", "Save as JPG" or "Save as SVG"  button.

eventHandlers.name: onSaveSignatureClick
eventHandlers.label: On Save Signature Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps Save Signature button.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOver
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Over Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer hovers over the canvas.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOut
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Out Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the mouse pointer leaves the canvas boundaries.
